attributes.action: Dance around naked for at least 3 hours a year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister must take at least 3 hours out of his busy schedule, to remove his clothes and dance to any music of his choice. This must happen once a year and can be split up along the year.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
